thread.title: C J Howard
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by C J Howard

author: C J Howard
title: C J Howard
text: Excellent service, two tyres fitted, 40 minutes, very competitive price. thought I had puncture in another tyre, but fitter confirmed I ddn't. Don't think I'll get tyres from anywhere else! My daughter has already decided to use tyresonthedrive as a result of my experience.Absolutely brilliant!
